known_issues: Popups/modals do not blur/dim the background, reducing focus on the active overlay

existing_features.title: Add a consistent blurred + dimmed backdrop effect whenever an overlay UI is open (e.g., modal dialogs like ProfileSetupModal and slide-over sheets), so the underlying page is visually de-emphasized and focus stays on the active popup.

new_feature_requests.summary: Blur/dim the background when any popup/modal appears so focus stays on the active overlay

projectName: Blur/dim background behind popups and modals to improve focus
